taskbody.context: Here we will walk through the sign up process for a Clockify Account

step.cmd: Select and open your internet browser.

Click on the sign up button in the top right of the screen or the get started button in the upper center of the screen. After selecting one of the buttons you will be brought to a screen to input your information.
You will then choose to either sign up using your email and creating a new password, or continuing with your Google account.
Click sign up and you will be brought to the Clockify tracker home page where you can get started.
A confirmation email will be sent to your provided email address. Confirm your account when possible.
